segments.text: I know why Mr . Fro didn't like our ad idea ! He doesn't know the first thing about coffee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: True . I always see him drinking instant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's take him some of Kitty's best and make the pitch again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think that will be enough to make him have a change of heart ?
segments.speaker: S2
